OpenMOSS/MOSS-TTSD

bilingual AI turns text into expressive dialogue speech

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • Modular text-to-speech system with multilingual support
  • chat-based open-source assistant that can run language models and connect with other apps
  • AI models for translating and transcribing speech and text between many languages
  • Text-to-speech library with advanced models in 17 languages (legacy models in 1100+), and tools for custom voice training
  • AI text-to-speech tool with fast voice cloning and emotion
  • AI chat platform supporting various language models and tools, inspired by ChatGPT
  • open-weight text-to-speech model for fast, natural voice synthesis
  • Ultravox: open-source model that handles both text and voice inputs for conversational AI
  • LLM-powered text-to-speech with voice cloning and bilingual support
  • OpenAI-compatible server for speech-to-text, translation, and text-to-speech
